paragraph: Call the office of Morton, Valihura & Zerbato, LLC at 302-426-1313 or contact the firm online to schedule an initial consultation.

detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: Attorneys with more than 75 years of combined experience. They have successfully represented clients in every civil court in Delaware, including Federal court.

detailsData.title: Client-Centered
detailsData.content: The firm has built an excellent reputation for ethics, reliability, and diligence. More than half of its clients come from referrals from other attorneys and current clients.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Services
detailsData.content: The firm handles traditional and complex legal matters including corporate, commercial, and business formation, representation, and litigation. They also provide representation for condominiums, homeowner and maintenance associations, and apartment and manufactured housing communities.

detailsData.title: Wide Geographic Reach
detailsData.content: Serving clients throughout New Castle, Kent, and Sussex Counties in Delaware, as well as in Pennsylvania, New Jersey, and Maryland. This allows them to efficiently and effectively handle civil litigation and business matters for a wide range of clients.

address: 3704 Kennett Pike, Suite 200, Greenville Professional Building, Greenville, Delaware 19807
subHeading: If It’s Housing, We Can Handle It.
valueProp: With three offices, the firm is well positioned to efficiently and effectively handle civil litigation and business matters for its clients throughout Delaware. Founder Michael P. Morton was a principal architect of the Commercial Rental Code and the Residential Landlord Tenant Code. He is also a co-founder of the Delaware Apartment Association and the First State Manufactured Housing Association. The firm is widely recognized by the courts and clients as the premiere landlord representative.
